rules.name: antiCheatDisabled
rules.description: Prevents players from rubberbanding when moving too fast
extras: ... or being kicked out for 'flying'
Puts more trust in clients positioning
Increases player allowed mining distance to 32 blocks

rules.name: carpets
rules.description: Placing carpets may issue carpet commands for non-op players

rules.name: combineXPOrbs
rules.description: XP orbs combine with other into bigger orbs

rules.name: commandCameramode
rules.description: Enables /c and /s commands to quickly switch between camera and survival modes
extras: /c and /s commands are available to all players regardless of their permission levels
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandDistance
rules.description: Enables /distance command to measure in game distance between points
extras: Also enables brown carpet placement action if 'carpets' rule is turned on as well
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandDraw
rules.description: Enables /draw commands
extras: ... allows for drawing simple shapes or
other shapes which are sorta difficult to do normally
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandInfo
rules.description: Enables /info command for blocks
extras: Also enables gray carpet placement action
if 'carpets' rule is turned on as well
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandLog
rules.description: Enables /log command to monitor events via chat and overlays
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPerimeterInfo
rules.description: Enables /perimeterinfo command
extras: ... that scans the area around the block for potential spawnable spots
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayer
rules.description: Enables /player command to control/spawn players
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandProfile
rules.description: Enables /profile command to monitor game performance
extras: subset of /tick command capabilities
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandScript
rules.description: Enables /script command
extras: An in-game scripting API for Scarpet programming language
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandScriptACE
rules.description: Enables restrictions for arbitrary code execution with scarpet
extras: Users that don't have this permission level
won't be able to load apps or /script run
validators: Also controls permission level of commands executed via `run()`
It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandSpawn
rules.description: Enables /spawn command for spawn tracking
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandTick
rules.description: Enables /tick command to control game clocks
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandTrackAI
rules.description: Allows to track mobs AI via /track command
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: creativeFlyDrag
rules.description: Creative air drag
extras: Increased drag will slow down your flight
So need to adjust speed accordingly
With 1.0 drag, using speed of 11 seems to matching vanilla speeds.
Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
validators: Must be between 0 and 1

Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: creativeFlySpeed
rules.description: Creative flying speed multiplier
extras: Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
validators: Must be a positive number

Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: creativeNoClip
rules.description: Creative No Clip
extras: On servers it needs to be set on both
client and server to function properly.
Has no effect when set on the server only
Can allow to phase through walls
if only set on the carpet client side
but requires some trapdoor magic to
allow the player to enter blocks
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: ctrlQCraftingFix
rules.description: Dropping entire stacks works also from on the crafting UI result slot

rules.name: customMOTD
rules.description: Sets a different motd message on client trying to connect to the server
extras: use '_' to use the startup setting from server.properties

rules.name: defaultLoggers
rules.description: sets these loggers in their default configurations for all new players
extras: use csv, like 'tps,mobcaps' for multiple loggers, none for nothing

rules.name: desertShrubs
rules.description: Saplings turn into dead shrubs in hot climates and no water access

rules.name: explosionNoBlockDamage
rules.description: Explosions won't destroy blocks

rules.name: extremeBehaviours
rules.description: Edge cases are as frequent as common cases, for testing only!!
extras: Velocities of items from dispensers, blaze projectiles, fireworks
Directions of fireballs, wither skulls, fishing bobbers,
items dropped from blocks and inventories, llamas spit, triggered trap horses
Damage dealt with projectiles
Blaze aggro sensitivity
Mobs spawned follow range

rules.name: fastRedstoneDust
rules.description: Lag optimizations for redstone dust
extras: by Theosib
.. also fixes some locational behaviours or vanilla redstone MC-11193
so behaviour of locational vanilla contraptions is not guaranteed

rules.name: fillLimit
rules.description: Customizable fill/clone volume limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M

rules.name: fillUpdates
rules.description: fill/clone/setblock and structure blocks cause block updates

rules.name: flatWorldStructureSpawning
rules.description: Allows structure mobs to spawn in flat worlds

rules.name: flippinCactus
rules.description: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding cactus
extras: Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped
Applies to pistons, observers, droppers, repeaters, stairs, glazed terracotta etc...

rules.name: fogOff
rules.description: Removes fog from client in the nether and the end
extras: Improves visibility, but looks weird
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: forceloadLimit
rules.description: Customizable forceload chunk limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M

rules.name: hardcodeTNTangle
rules.description: Sets the horizontal random angle on TNT for debugging of TNT contraptions
extras: Set to -1 for default behavior
validators: Must be between 0 and 2pi, or -1

rules.name: hopperCounters
rules.description: hoppers pointing to wool will count items passing through them
extras: Enables /counter command, and actions while placing red and green carpets on wool blocks
Use /counter <color?> reset to reset the counter, and /counter <color?> to query
In survival, place green carpet on same color wool to query, red to reset the counters
Counters are global and shared between players, 16 channels available
Items counted are destroyed, count up to one stack per tick per hopper
validators: It has an accompanying command

rules.name: huskSpawningInTemples
rules.description: Only husks spawn in desert temples

rules.name: interactionUpdates
rules.description: placing blocks cause block updates

rules.name: lagFreeSpawning
rules.description: Spawning requires much less CPU and Memory

rules.name: language
rules.description: sets the language for carpet

rules.name: leadFix
rules.description: Fixes leads breaking/becoming invisible in unloaded chunks
extras: You may still get visibly broken leash links on the client side, but server side the link is still there.

rules.name: maxEntityCollisions
rules.description: Customizable maximal entity collision limits, 0 for no limits
validators: Must be a positive number

rules.name: mergeTNT
rules.description: Merges stationary primed TNT entities

rules.name: missingTools
rules.description: Pistons, Glass and Sponge can be broken faster with their appropriate tools

rules.name: movableBlockEntities
rules.description: Pistons can push block entities, like hoppers, chests etc.

rules.name: onePlayerSleeping
rules.description: One player is required on the server to cause night to pass

rules.name: optimizedTNT
rules.description: TNT causes less lag when exploding in the same spot and in liquids

rules.name: persistentParrots
rules.description: Parrots don't get of your shoulders until you receive proper damage

rules.name: placementRotationFix
rules.description: fixes block placement rotation issue when player rotates quickly while placing blocks

rules.name: portalCreativeDelay
rules.description: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in creative
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000

rules.name: portalSuffocationFix
rules.description: Nether portals correctly place entities going through
extras: Entities shouldn't suffocate in obsidian

rules.name: portalSurvivalDelay
rules.description: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in survival
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000

rules.name: pushLimit
rules.description: Customizable piston push limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 1024

rules.name: quasiConnectivity
rules.description: Pistons, droppers and dispensers react if block above them is powered

rules.name: railPowerLimit
rules.description: Customizable powered rail power range
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 1024

rules.name: renewableCoral
rules.description: Coral structures will grow with bonemeal from coral plants

rules.name: renewableSponges
rules.description: Guardians turn into Elder Guardian when struck by lightning

rules.name: rotatorBlock
rules.description: Cactus in dispensers rotates blocks.
extras: Rotates block anti-clockwise if possible

rules.name: scriptsAutoload
rules.description: Scarpet script from world files will autoload on server/world start
extras: if /script is enabled

rules.name: shulkerSpawningInEndCities
rules.description: Shulkers will respawn in end cities

rules.name: silverFishDropGravel
rules.description: Silverfish drop a gravel item when breaking out of a block

rules.name: smoothClientAnimations
rules.description: smooth client animations with low tps settings
extras: works only in SP, and will slow down players
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: spawnChunksSize
rules.description: Changes size of spawn chunks
extras: Defines new radius
setting it to 0 - disables spawn chunks

rules.name: stackableShulkerBoxes
rules.description: Empty shulker boxes can stack to 64 when dropped on the ground
extras: To move them around between inventories, use shift click to move entire stacks

rules.name: summonNaturalLightning
rules.description: summoning a lightning bolt has all the side effects of natural lightning

rules.name: superSecretSetting
rules.description: Gbhs sgnf sadsgras fhskdpri!

rules.name: tntDoNotUpdate
rules.description: TNT doesn't update when placed against a power source

rules.name: tntPrimerMomentumRemoved
rules.description: Removes random TNT momentum when primed

rules.name: tntRandomRange
rules.description: Sets the tnt random explosion range to a fixed value
extras: Set to -1 for default behavior
validators: optimizedTNT must be enabled
Cannot be negative, except for -1

rules.name: unloadedEntityFix
rules.description: Entities pushed or moved into unloaded chunks no longer disappear

rules.name: viewDistance
rules.description: Changes the view distance of the server.
extras: Set to 0 to not override the value in server settings.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 (use server settings) to 32

rules.name: xpNoCooldown
rules.description: Players absorb XP instantly, without delay
